name: Installation
author: Mahboob Ur Rehman

sections.description:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install from the Plugin browser
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add shortcode to any page [veteranlogix_cron_job]
  4. This plugin also adds a page on wordpress backend to view all crons schedualed .
